name: Castle Mini Games
description:
This is a 2D video game made it with Unity 3D that contains a series of mini games in  a mediaval age, every mini game has a duration of 1 min and you need to get points as you can for the finla score, for now there are only 4 mini games:

  1. Runner (You only needs to jump and get some coins :D)
  2. Dragon (You need to fire flames to other flames yeahh i know doesn't make sense but i didn't have another idea at the moment xD, to acomplish this game you need to use the space keyboard key and arrows keys to move)
  3. Archer (You need to destroy the enemies that is trying to kill you, ¿How can i kill the monsters?. Use the arrows keys and throw arrows with the left click of your mouse)
  4. Platform (You need to get to the top of the platform as fast you can meanwhile there are some many barrels that are falling).

There are not instructions inside the game about how to played, for that reason i left the comments here, i'm appologize for that but in the future i'll try to improve it displaying how to play it at the start of every mini game, but for now enjoy it and let your comments for bad or for good all the comments are welcome ;).
